116 void ScanMatcher::computeActiveArea(ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings){
117  if (m_activeAreaComputed)
118  return;
119  OrientedPoint lp=p;
120  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
121  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
122  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;//？？？？？
123  IntPoint p0=map.world2map(lp);
124 
125  Point min(map.map2world(0,0));
126  Point max(map.map2world(map.getMapSizeX()-1,map.getMapSizeY()-1));
127 
128  if (lp.x<min.x) min.x=lp.x;
129  if (lp.y<min.y) min.y=lp.y;
130  if (lp.x>max.x) max.x=lp.x;
131  if (lp.y>max.y) max.y=lp.y;
132 
133  /*determine the size of the area*/
134  const double * angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;
135  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++)
136  {
137  if (*r>m_laserMaxRange||*r==0.0||isnan(*r)) continue;
138  double d=*r>m_usableRange?m_usableRange:*r;
139  Point phit=lp;
140  phit.x+=d*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
141  phit.y+=d*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
142  if (phit.x<min.x) min.x=phit.x;
143  if (phit.y<min.y) min.y=phit.y;
144  if (phit.x>max.x) max.x=phit.x;
145  if (phit.y>max.y) max.y=phit.y;
146  }
147  //min=min-Point(map.getDelta(),map.getDelta());
148  //max=max+Point(map.getDelta(),map.getDelta());
149 
150  if ( !map.isInside(min) || !map.isInside(max)){
151  Point lmin(map.map2world(0,0));
152  Point lmax(map.map2world(map.getMapSizeX()-1,map.getMapSizeY()-1));
153  //cerr << "CURRENT MAP " << lmin.x << " " << lmin.y << " " << lmax.x << " " << lmax.y << endl;
154  //cerr << "BOUNDARY OVERRIDE " << min.x << " " << min.y << " " << max.x << " " << max.y << endl;
155  min.x=( min.x >= lmin.x )? lmin.x: min.x-m_enlargeStep;
156  max.x=( max.x <= lmax.x )? lmax.x: max.x+m_enlargeStep;
157  min.y=( min.y >= lmin.y )? lmin.y: min.y-m_enlargeStep;
158  max.y=( max.y <= lmax.y )? lmax.y: max.y+m_enlargeStep;
159  map.resize(min.x, min.y, max.x, max.y); //地图大小调整
160  //cerr << "RESIZE " << min.x << " " << min.y << " " << max.x << " " << max.y << endl;
161  }
162 
163  HierarchicalArray2D<PointAccumulator>::PointSet activeArea;
164  /*allocate the active area*/
165  angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;
166  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++)
167  if (m_generateMap){
168  double d=*r;
169  if (d>m_laserMaxRange||d==0.0||isnan(d))
170  continue;
171  if (d>m_usableRange)
172  d=m_usableRange;
173  Point phit=lp+Point(d*cos(lp.theta+*angle),d*sin(lp.theta+*angle));
174  IntPoint p0=map.world2map(lp);
175  IntPoint p1=map.world2map(phit);
176 
177  //IntPoint linePoints[20000] ;
178  GridLineTraversalLine line;
179  line.points=m_linePoints;
180  GridLineTraversal::gridLine(p0, p1, &line);
181  for (int i=0; i<line.num_points-1; i++){
182  assert(map.isInside(m_linePoints[i]));
183  activeArea.insert(map.storage().patchIndexes(m_linePoints[i]));
184  assert(m_linePoints[i].x>=0 && m_linePoints[i].y>=0);
185  }
186  if (d<m_usableRange){
187  IntPoint cp=map.storage().patchIndexes(p1);
188  assert(cp.x>=0 && cp.y>=0);
189  activeArea.insert(cp);
190  }
191  } else {
192  if (*r>m_laserMaxRange||*r>m_usableRange||*r==0.0||isnan(*r)) continue;
193  Point phit=lp;
194  phit.x+=*r*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
195  phit.y+=*r*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
196  IntPoint p1=map.world2map(phit);
197  assert(p1.x>=0 && p1.y>=0);
198  IntPoint cp=map.storage().patchIndexes(p1);
199  assert(cp.x>=0 && cp.y>=0);
200  activeArea.insert(cp);
201  }
202 
203  //this allocates the unallocated cells in the active area of the map
204  //cout << "activeArea::size() " << activeArea.size() << endl;
205 /*
206  cerr << "ActiveArea=";
207  for (HierarchicalArray2D<PointAccumulator>::PointSet::const_iterator it=activeArea.begin(); it!= activeArea.end(); it++){
208  cerr << "(" << it->x <<"," << it->y << ") ";
209  }
210  cerr << endl;
211 */
212  map.storage().setActiveArea(activeArea, true);
213  m_activeAreaComputed=true;
214 }
215 
216 double ScanMatcher::registerScan(ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings){
217  if (!m_activeAreaComputed)
218  computeActiveArea(map, p, readings);
219 
220  //this operation replicates the cells that will be changed in the registration operation
221  map.storage().allocActiveArea();
222 
223  OrientedPoint lp=p;
224  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
225  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
226  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;
227  IntPoint p0=map.world2map(lp);
228 
229 
230  const double * angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;
231  double esum=0;
232  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++)
233  if (m_generateMap){
234  double d=*r;
235  if (d>m_laserMaxRange||d==0.0||isnan(d))
236  continue;
237  if (d>m_usableRange)
238  d=m_usableRange;
239  Point phit=lp+Point(d*cos(lp.theta+*angle),d*sin(lp.theta+*angle));
240  IntPoint p1=map.world2map(phit);
241  //IntPoint linePoints[20000] ;
242  GridLineTraversalLine line;
243  line.points=m_linePoints;
244  GridLineTraversal::gridLine(p0, p1, &line); //line??????????
245  for (int i=0; i<line.num_points-1; i++){
246  PointAccumulator& cell=map.cell(line.points[i]);
247  double e=-cell.entropy();
248  cell.update(false, Point(0,0));
249  e+=cell.entropy();
250  esum+=e;
251  }
252  if (d<m_usableRange){
253  double e=-map.cell(p1).entropy();
254  map.cell(p1).update(true, phit);
255  e+=map.cell(p1).entropy();
256  esum+=e;
257  }
258  } else {
259  if (*r>m_laserMaxRange||*r>m_usableRange||*r==0.0||isnan(*r)) continue;
260  Point phit=lp;
261  phit.x+=*r*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
262  phit.y+=*r*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
263  IntPoint p1=map.world2map(phit);
264  assert(p1.x>=0 && p1.y>=0);
265  map.cell(p1).update(true,phit);
266  }
267  //cout << "informationGain=" << -esum << endl;
268  return esum;
269 }

272 void ScanMatcher::registerScan(ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings){
273  if (!m_activeAreaComputed)
274  computeActiveArea(map, p, readings);
275 
276  //this operation replicates the cells that will be changed in the registration operation

278 
279  OrientedPoint lp=p;
280  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
281  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
282  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;
283  IntPoint p0=map.world2map(lp);
284  const double * angle=m_laserAngles;
285  for (const double* r=readings; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++)
286  if (m_generateMap){
287  double d=*r;
288  if (d>m_laserMaxRange)
289  continue;

292  Point phit=lp+Point(d*cos(lp.theta+*angle),d*sin(lp.theta+*angle));

299  for (int i=0; i<line.num_points-1; i++){
300  IntPoint ci=map.storage().patchIndexes(line.points[i]);
301  if (map.storage().getActiveArea().find(ci)==map.storage().getActiveArea().end())
302  cerr << "BIG ERROR" <<endl;
303  map.cell(line.points[i]).update(false, Point(0,0));
304  }
305  if (d<=m_usableRange){
306 
307  map.cell(p1).update(true,phit);

319 
320 double ScanMatcher::icpOptimize(OrientedPoint& pnew, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& init, const double* readings) const{
321  double currentScore;
322  double sc=score(map, init, readings);;
323  OrientedPoint start=init;
324  pnew=init;
325  int iterations=0;
326  do{
327  currentScore=sc;
328  sc=icpStep(pnew, map, start, readings);
329  //cerr << "pstart=" << start.x << " " <<start.y << " " << start.theta << endl;
330  //cerr << "pret=" << pnew.x << " " <<pnew.y << " " << pnew.theta << endl;
331  start=pnew;
332  iterations++;
333  } while (sc>currentScore);
334  cerr << "i="<< iterations << endl;
335  return currentScore;
336 }
337 
338 
351 double ScanMatcher::optimize(OrientedPoint& pnew, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& init, const double* readings) const{
352  double bestScore=-1;
353  OrientedPoint currentPose=init;
354  double currentScore=score(map, currentPose, readings);
355  double adelta=m_optAngularDelta, ldelta=m_optLinearDelta;
356  unsigned int refinement=0;
357  enum Move{Front, Back, Left, Right, TurnLeft, TurnRight, Done};
358 /* cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__<< " readings: ";
359  for (int i=0; i<m_laserBeams; i++){
360  cout << readings[i] << " ";
361  }
362  cout << endl;
363 */
364  int c_iterations=0;
365  do{//次数与分数迭代
366  if (bestScore>=currentScore){
367  refinement++;
368  adelta*=.5;
369  ldelta*=.5;
370  }
371  bestScore=currentScore;
372 // cout <<"score="<< currentScore << " refinement=" << refinement;
373 // cout << "pose=" << currentPose.x << " " << currentPose.y << " " << currentPose.theta << endl;
374  OrientedPoint bestLocalPose=currentPose;
375  OrientedPoint localPose=currentPose;
376 
377  Move move=Front;
378  do {
379  localPose=currentPose;
380  switch(move){
381  case Front:
382  localPose.x+=ldelta;
383  move=Back;
384  break;
385  case Back:
386  localPose.x-=ldelta;
387  move=Left;
388  break;
389  case Left:
390  localPose.y-=ldelta;
391  move=Right;
392  break;
393  case Right:
394  localPose.y+=ldelta;
395  move=TurnLeft;
396  break;
397  case TurnLeft:
398  localPose.theta+=adelta;
399  move=TurnRight;
400  break;
401  case TurnRight:
402  localPose.theta-=adelta;
403  move=Done;
404  break;
405  default:;
406  }
407 
408  double odo_gain=1;
409  if (m_angularOdometryReliability>0.){
410  double dth=init.theta-localPose.theta; dth=atan2(sin(dth), cos(dth)); dth*=dth;
411  odo_gain*=exp(-m_angularOdometryReliability*dth); // 调整的高斯均值
412  }
413  if (m_linearOdometryReliability>0.){
414  double dx=init.x-localPose.x;
415  double dy=init.y-localPose.y;
416  double drho=dx*dx+dy*dy;
417  odo_gain*=exp(-m_linearOdometryReliability*drho);
418  }
419  double localScore=odo_gain*score(map, localPose, readings);
420 
421  if (localScore>currentScore){
422  currentScore=localScore;
423  bestLocalPose=localPose;
424  }
425  c_iterations++;
426  } while(move!=Done);
427  currentPose=bestLocalPose;
428 // cout << "currentScore=" << currentScore<< endl;
429  //here we look for the best move;
430  }while (currentScore>bestScore || refinement<m_optRecursiveIterations);
431  //cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << "bestScore=" << bestScore<< endl;
432  //cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << "iterations=" << c_iterations<< endl;
433  pnew=currentPose;
434  return bestScore;
435 }
436 
437 struct ScoredMove{
438  OrientedPoint pose;
439  double score;
440  double likelihood;
441 };
442 
443 typedef std::list<ScoredMove> ScoredMoveList;
444 
445 double ScanMatcher::optimize(OrientedPoint& _mean, ScanMatcher::CovarianceMatrix& _cov, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& init, const double* readings) const{
446  ScoredMoveList moveList;
447  double bestScore=-1;
448  OrientedPoint currentPose=init;
449  ScoredMove sm={currentPose,0,0};
450  unsigned int matched=likelihoodAndScore(sm.score, sm.likelihood, map, currentPose, readings);
451  double currentScore=sm.score;
452  moveList.push_back(sm);
453  double adelta=m_optAngularDelta, ldelta=m_optLinearDelta;
454  unsigned int refinement=0;
455  int count=0;
456  enum Move{Front, Back, Left, Right, TurnLeft, TurnRight, Done};
457  do{
458  if (bestScore>=currentScore){
459  refinement++;
460  adelta*=.5;
461  ldelta*=.5;
462  }
463  bestScore=currentScore;
464 // cout <<"score="<< currentScore << " refinement=" << refinement;
465 // cout << "pose=" << currentPose.x << " " << currentPose.y << " " << currentPose.theta << endl;
466  OrientedPoint bestLocalPose=currentPose;
467  OrientedPoint localPose=currentPose;
468 
469  Move move=Front;
470  do {
471  localPose=currentPose;
472  switch(move){
473  case Front:
474  localPose.x+=ldelta;
475  move=Back;
476  break;
477  case Back:
478  localPose.x-=ldelta;
479  move=Left;
480  break;
481  case Left:
482  localPose.y-=ldelta;
483  move=Right;
484  break;
485  case Right:
486  localPose.y+=ldelta;
487  move=TurnLeft;
488  break;
489  case TurnLeft:
490  localPose.theta+=adelta;
491  move=TurnRight;
492  break;
493  case TurnRight:
494  localPose.theta-=adelta;
495  move=Done;
496  break;
497  default:;
498  }
499  double localScore, localLikelihood;
500 
501  double odo_gain=1;
502  if (m_angularOdometryReliability>0.){
503  double dth=init.theta-localPose.theta; dth=atan2(sin(dth), cos(dth)); dth*=dth;
504  odo_gain*=exp(-m_angularOdometryReliability*dth);
505  }
506  if (m_linearOdometryReliability>0.){
507  double dx=init.x-localPose.x;
508  double dy=init.y-localPose.y;
509  double drho=dx*dx+dy*dy;
510  odo_gain*=exp(-m_linearOdometryReliability*drho);
511  }
512  localScore=odo_gain*score(map, localPose, readings);
513  //update the score
514  count++;
515  matched=likelihoodAndScore(localScore, localLikelihood, map, localPose, readings);
516  if (localScore>currentScore){
517  currentScore=localScore;
518  bestLocalPose=localPose;
519  }
520  sm.score=localScore;
521  sm.likelihood=localLikelihood;//+log(odo_gain);
522  sm.pose=localPose;
523  moveList.push_back(sm);
524  //update the move list
525  } while(move!=Done);
526  currentPose=bestLocalPose;
527  //cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << "currentScore=" << currentScore<< endl;
528  //here we look for the best move;
529  }while (currentScore>bestScore || refinement<m_optRecursiveIterations);
530  //cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << "bestScore=" << bestScore<< endl;
531  //cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << "iterations=" << count<< endl;
532 
533  //normalize the likelihood
534  double lmin=1e9;
535  double lmax=-1e9;
536  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
537  lmin=it->likelihood<lmin?it->likelihood:lmin;
538  lmax=it->likelihood>lmax?it->likelihood:lmax;
539  }
540  //cout << "lmin=" << lmin << " lmax=" << lmax<< endl;
541  for (ScoredMoveList::iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
542  it->likelihood=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
543  //cout << "l=" << it->likelihood << endl;
544  }
545  //compute the mean
546  OrientedPoint mean(0,0,0);
547  double lacc=0;
548  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
549  mean=mean+it->pose*it->likelihood;
550  lacc+=it->likelihood;
551  }
552  mean=mean*(1./lacc);
553  //OrientedPoint delta=mean-currentPose;
554  //cout << "delta.x=" << delta.x << " delta.y=" << delta.y << " delta.theta=" << delta.theta << endl;
555  CovarianceMatrix cov={0.,0.,0.,0.,0.,0.};
556  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
557  OrientedPoint delta=it->pose-mean;
558  delta.theta=atan2(sin(delta.theta), cos(delta.theta));
559  cov.xx+=delta.x*delta.x*it->likelihood;
560  cov.yy+=delta.y*delta.y*it->likelihood;
561  cov.tt+=delta.theta*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
562  cov.xy+=delta.x*delta.y*it->likelihood;
563  cov.xt+=delta.x*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
564  cov.yt+=delta.y*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
565  }
566  cov.xx/=lacc, cov.xy/=lacc, cov.xt/=lacc, cov.yy/=lacc, cov.yt/=lacc, cov.tt/=lacc;
567 
568  _mean=currentPose;
569  _cov=cov;
570  return bestScore;
571 }
572 
573 void ScanMatcher::setLaserParameters
574  (unsigned int beams, double* angles, const OrientedPoint& lpose){
575  /*if (m_laserAngles)
576  delete [] m_laserAngles;
577  */
578  assert(beams<LASER_MAXBEAMS);
579  m_laserPose=lpose;
580  m_laserBeams=beams;
581  //m_laserAngles=new double[beams];
582  memcpy(m_laserAngles, angles, sizeof(double)*m_laserBeams);
583 }

585 
586 double ScanMatcher::likelihood
587  (double& _lmax, OrientedPoint& _mean, CovarianceMatrix& _cov, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings){
588  ScoredMoveList moveList;
589 
590  for (double xx=-m_llsamplerange; xx<=m_llsamplerange; xx+=m_llsamplestep)
591  for (double yy=-m_llsamplerange; yy<=m_llsamplerange; yy+=m_llsamplestep)
592  for (double tt=-m_lasamplerange; tt<=m_lasamplerange; tt+=m_lasamplestep){
593 
594  OrientedPoint rp=p;
595  rp.x+=xx;
596  rp.y+=yy;
597  rp.theta+=tt;
598 
599  ScoredMove sm;
600  sm.pose=rp;
601 
602  likelihoodAndScore(sm.score, sm.likelihood, map, rp, readings);
603  moveList.push_back(sm);
604  }
605 
606  //OrientedPoint delta=mean-currentPose;
607  //cout << "delta.x=" << delta.x << " delta.y=" << delta.y << " delta.theta=" << delta.theta << endl;
608  //normalize the likelihood
609  double lmax=-1e9;
610  double lcum=0;
611  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
612  lmax=it->likelihood>lmax?it->likelihood:lmax;
613  }
614  for (ScoredMoveList::iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
615  //it->likelihood=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
616  lcum+=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
617  it->likelihood=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
618  //cout << "l=" << it->likelihood << endl;
619  }
620 
621  OrientedPoint mean(0,0,0);
622  double s=0,c=0;
623  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
624  mean=mean+it->pose*it->likelihood;
625  s+=it->likelihood*sin(it->pose.theta);
626  c+=it->likelihood*cos(it->pose.theta);
627  }
628  mean=mean*(1./lcum);
629  s/=lcum;
630  c/=lcum;
631  mean.theta=atan2(s,c);
632 
633 
634  CovarianceMatrix cov={0.,0.,0.,0.,0.,0.};
635  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
636  OrientedPoint delta=it->pose-mean;
637  delta.theta=atan2(sin(delta.theta), cos(delta.theta));
638  cov.xx+=delta.x*delta.x*it->likelihood;
639  cov.yy+=delta.y*delta.y*it->likelihood;
640  cov.tt+=delta.theta*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
641  cov.xy+=delta.x*delta.y*it->likelihood;
642  cov.xt+=delta.x*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
643  cov.yt+=delta.y*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
644  }
645  cov.xx/=lcum, cov.xy/=lcum, cov.xt/=lcum, cov.yy/=lcum, cov.yt/=lcum, cov.tt/=lcum;
646 
647  _mean=mean;
648  _cov=cov;
649  _lmax=lmax;
650  return log(lcum)+lmax;
651 }
652 
653 double ScanMatcher::likelihood
654  (double& _lmax, OrientedPoint& _mean, CovarianceMatrix& _cov, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p,
655  Gaussian3& odometry, const double* readings, double gain){
656  ScoredMoveList moveList;
657 
658 
659  for (double xx=-m_llsamplerange; xx<=m_llsamplerange; xx+=m_llsamplestep)
660  for (double yy=-m_llsamplerange; yy<=m_llsamplerange; yy+=m_llsamplestep)
661  for (double tt=-m_lasamplerange; tt<=m_lasamplerange; tt+=m_lasamplestep){
662 
663  OrientedPoint rp=p;
664  rp.x+=xx;
665  rp.y+=yy;
666  rp.theta+=tt;
667 
668  ScoredMove sm;
669  sm.pose=rp;
670 
671  likelihoodAndScore(sm.score, sm.likelihood, map, rp, readings);
672  sm.likelihood+=odometry.eval(rp)/gain;
673  assert(!isnan(sm.likelihood));
674  moveList.push_back(sm);
675  }
676 
677  //OrientedPoint delta=mean-currentPose;
678  //cout << "delta.x=" << delta.x << " delta.y=" << delta.y << " delta.theta=" << delta.theta << endl;
679  //normalize the likelihood
680  double lmax=-std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
681  double lcum=0;
682  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
683  lmax=it->likelihood>lmax?it->likelihood:lmax;
684  }
685  for (ScoredMoveList::iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
686  //it->likelihood=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
687  lcum+=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
688  it->likelihood=exp(it->likelihood-lmax);
689  //cout << "l=" << it->likelihood << endl;
690  }
691 
692  OrientedPoint mean(0,0,0);
693  double s=0,c=0;
694  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
695  mean=mean+it->pose*it->likelihood;
696  s+=it->likelihood*sin(it->pose.theta);
697  c+=it->likelihood*cos(it->pose.theta);
698  }
699  mean=mean*(1./lcum);
700  s/=lcum;
701  c/=lcum;
702  mean.theta=atan2(s,c);
703 
704 
705  CovarianceMatrix cov={0.,0.,0.,0.,0.,0.};
706  for (ScoredMoveList::const_iterator it=moveList.begin(); it!=moveList.end(); it++){
707  OrientedPoint delta=it->pose-mean;
708  delta.theta=atan2(sin(delta.theta), cos(delta.theta));
709  cov.xx+=delta.x*delta.x*it->likelihood;
710  cov.yy+=delta.y*delta.y*it->likelihood;
711  cov.tt+=delta.theta*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
712  cov.xy+=delta.x*delta.y*it->likelihood;
713  cov.xt+=delta.x*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
714  cov.yt+=delta.y*delta.theta*it->likelihood;
715  }
716  cov.xx/=lcum, cov.xy/=lcum, cov.xt/=lcum, cov.yy/=lcum, cov.yt/=lcum, cov.tt/=lcum;
717 
718  _mean=mean;
719  _cov=cov;
720  _lmax=lmax;
721  double v=log(lcum)+lmax;
722  assert(!isnan(v));
723  return v;
724 }

726 void ScanMatcher::setMatchingParameters
727  (double urange, double range, double sigma, int kernsize, double lopt, double aopt, int iterations, double likelihoodSigma, unsigned int likelihoodSkip){
728  m_usableRange=urange;
729  m_laserMaxRange=range;
730  m_kernelSize=kernsize;
731  m_optLinearDelta=lopt;
732  m_optAngularDelta=aopt;
733  m_optRecursiveIterations=iterations;
734  m_gaussianSigma=sigma;
735  m_likelihoodSigma=likelihoodSigma;
736  m_likelihoodSkip=likelihoodSkip;
737 }
738 
739 };
